GOD.content: [we are all Abraham in every instant] responsibility and relation of gift of death of each instant
GOD.linkedContent: [we are all Abraham in every instant] responsibility and relation of gift of death of each instant

GOD.content: via tout autre est tout autre & Kierkegaard, supplementary complication upon ethical generality: everyone else asks at every moment to behave as knights of faith
GOD.linkedContent: via tout autre est tout autre & Kierkegaard, supplementary complication upon ethical generality: everyone else asks at every moment to behave as knights of faith

GT.content: the mapped-out signified of structuralism, a complementarity w/out supplement that conditions “exercise of symbolic thinking” > this is the rationality of the principle of reason
GT.linkedContent: the mapped-out signified of structuralism, a complementarity w/out supplement that conditions “exercise of symbolic thinking” > this is the rationality of the principle of reason

GT.content: language elle vole, elle nous souffle, withdraws (soustrait) responsibility it seems to inaugurate, this originary supplementarity extends far beyond language in strict sense to all textuality
GT.linkedContent: language elle vole, elle nous souffle, withdraws (soustrait) responsibility it seems to inaugurate, this originary supplementarity extends far beyond language in strict sense to all textuality

GT.content: “another border already divided itself in indefinite abyssal supplements”
GT.linkedContent: “another border already divided itself in indefinite abyssal supplements”

FK.content: in view of invisible, spectral sur-vival, an excess beyond living, life worth more than life, space of death opens—linked to automaton (exemplarily “phallic”), to technics, machine, prosthesis
FK.linkedContent: in view of invisible, spectral sur-vival, an excess beyond living, life worth more than life, space of death opens—linked to automaton (exemplarily “phallic”), to technics, machine, prosthesis

FK.content: these dimensions of self-sacrificial supplementarity, the auto-co-immunity, com-mon auto-immunity, keep community alive, open to something other, more than itself (a spectralizing messiancity beyond all messianism)
FK.linkedContent: these dimensions of self-sacrificial supplementarity, the auto-co-immunity, com-mon auto-immunity, keep community alive, open to something other, more than itself (a spectralizing messiancity beyond all messianism)

FK.content: no alliance of 2 [faith & religion], plus d’un at once more than 2: iterability, division at source > supplement introduces incalculable in heart of calculable; pure faith = pure madness
FK.linkedContent: no alliance of 2 [faith & religion], plus d’un at once more than 2: iterability, division at source > supplement introduces incalculable in heart of calculable; pure faith = pure madness

FK.content: n + 1 incalculably engenders all supplements: crypt

LOBL.content: Blanchot: survivre, not living maintaining oneself, lifeless, in a state of pure supplement, movement of supplementing life, but stopping (arrêter) the dying, a stopping that doesn’t stop > speak on the arrête (ridge, cutting edge, backbone, fish bone, arris)
LOBL.linkedContent: Blanchot: survivre, not living maintaining oneself, lifeless, in a state of pure supplement, movement of supplementing life, but stopping (arrêter) the dying, a stopping that doesn’t stop > speak on the arrête (ridge, cutting edge, backbone, fish bone, arris)

LOBL.content: sur, “on”, the entire enigma of “supplementary logic” [cf. GLAS p. 81r “sur” vs. “dans”]
LOBL.linkedContent: sur, “on”, the entire enigma of “supplementary logic” [cf. GLAS p. 81r “sur” vs. “dans”]

LOBL.content: survival & revenance, living on & returning from the dead: goes beyond life and death, supplementing each w/ sudden surge, a reprieve
LOBL.linkedContent: survival & revenance, living on & returning from the dead: goes beyond life and death, supplementing each w/ sudden surge, a reprieve

LOBL.content: reaffirmation, triumph over (sur, hyper), living-on, a supplement of life that is better than life and better than death, better than truth > la Chose par excellence: sur-vérité [see pp. 137-38 la sur-vérité du survivre][Blanchot calls la Chose the event]
LOBL.linkedContent: reaffirmation, triumph over (sur, hyper), living-on, a supplement of life that is better than life and better than death, better than truth > la Chose par excellence: sur-vérité [see pp. 137-38 la sur-vérité du survivre][Blanchot calls la Chose the event]

LOBL.content: living on establishes the supplement [is supplement 2nd?], in truth beyond truth (la sur-vérité), supplement of truth w/out truth
LOBL.linkedContent: living on establishes the supplement [is supplement 2nd?], in truth beyond truth (la sur-vérité), supplement of truth w/out truth

POO.content: responsibility not in one’s own name but arises in structure of supplementarity: in my name as the name of the other > singularity quakes in exemplary equivocality of this “as”
POO.linkedContent: responsibility not in one’s own name but arises in structure of supplementarity: in my name as the name of the other > singularity quakes in exemplary equivocality of this “as”

SPOM.content: acc. Marx, the ghost effect not only spiritualization, autonomization of spirit, idea, or thought (Hegelian idealism), but also supplementary moment after autonomization, one more simulacrum is added: a body, flesh (Leib)
SPOM.linkedContent: acc. Marx, the ghost effect not only spiritualization, autonomization of spirit, idea, or thought (Hegelian idealism), but also supplementary moment after autonomization, one more simulacrum is added: a body, flesh (Leib)

SPOM.content: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good

SPOM.content: the supplement of an internal-external fold, in abyssal fashion, marks the closure or principle of ruin of a philosophy of life, and of subjectivity: si on intégrait à la vie de cette subjectivité vivante le travail de la négativité ou de l’objectivité, les phénomènes ou plutôt les non-phénomènes de la mort, etc., pourquoi s’obstiner encore à appeler cela vie?
SPOM.linkedContent: the supplement of an internal-external fold, in abyssal fashion, marks the closure or principle of ruin of a philosophy of life, and of subjectivity: si on intégrait à la vie de cette subjectivité vivante le travail de la négativité ou de l’objectivité, les phénomènes ou plutôt les non-phénomènes de la mort, etc., pourquoi s’obstiner encore à appeler cela vie?

POOF.content: is there a worse jealousy than jealousy of self? is there any other? jealous of one’s very own brother: qui est le plus d’un, le supplément de l’un en trop? [the friend, says Nietzsche’s hermit]
POOF.linkedContent: is there a worse jealousy than jealousy of self? is there any other? jealous of one’s very own brother: qui est le plus d’un, le supplément de l’un en trop? [the friend, says Nietzsche’s hermit]

HASD.content: s’il y avait une expérience purement pure de la prière would one need a supplement? would a theology, a theiology, be possible w/out supplement?
HASD.linkedContent: s’il y avait une expérience purement pure de la prière would one need a supplement? would a theology, a theiology, be possible w/out supplement?

MPM.content: fatality (of tropological dislocation) is the law, non-totalization [impossibility of coming into being], the law of the law, that the law takes turns w/, as if it were, its own supplement
MPM.linkedContent: fatality (of tropological dislocation) is the law, non-totalization [impossibility of coming into being], the law of the law, that the law takes turns w/, as if it were, its own supplement

SEC.content: though representation supplements presence, the general assumption [Condillac] is that writing repairs > a continuous, homogenous modification of presence in representation
SEC.linkedContent: though representation supplements presence, the general assumption [Condillac] is that writing repairs > a continuous, homogenous modification of presence in representation

PP.content: “not serious” and “serious” can both add nothing to a text, instead: reading or writing supplement rigorously prescribed > a play, il faut accorder le système de tous ses pouvoirs
PP.linkedContent: “not serious” and “serious” can both add nothing to a text, instead: reading or writing supplement rigorously prescribed > a play, il faut accorder le système de tous ses pouvoirs

PP.content: supplement introduces possibility of the equivocal, dissimulation, deception, lies
PP.linkedContent: supplement introduces possibility of the equivocal, dissimulation, deception, lies

PP.content: pure play of traces, supplements w/out transcendental signified, no absolutely external reference, on and on infinitely, is not w/out its own violence
PP.linkedContent: pure play of traces, supplements w/out transcendental signified, no absolutely external reference, on and on infinitely, is not w/out its own violence

PP.content: Thoth supplants and supplements (en le suppléant) its other (father, sun, life, speech, origin or orient); at same time Thoth takes shape from very thing it resists and substitutes for
PP.linkedContent: Thoth supplants and supplements (en le suppléant) its other (father, sun, life, speech, origin or orient); at same time Thoth takes shape from very thing it resists and substitutes for

PP.content: Thoth opposes itself, passes into its other > messenger-god is truly god of absolute passage btwn opposites: god of non-identity (if he had identity: coincidentia oppositorum)
PP.linkedContent: Thoth opposes itself, passes into its other > messenger-god is truly god of absolute passage btwn opposites: god of non-identity (if he had identity: coincidentia oppositorum)

PP.content: how can supplementary parasite be excluded by maintaining boundary or triangle?
PP.linkedContent: how can supplementary parasite be excluded by maintaining boundary or triangle?

PP.content: supplement is dangerous because it doesn’t exist (not a simple non-being, its sliding slips it out of alternative presence/absence)
PP.linkedContent: supplement is dangerous because it doesn’t exist (not a simple non-being, its sliding slips it out of alternative presence/absence)

PP.content: (125) once there’s a supplement, there’s a supplement of a supplement (this is its structure); Plato fears this fatal entrainment, though it’s linked to eidos as possibility of repetition of same
PP.linkedContent: (125) once there’s a supplement, there’s a supplement of a supplement (this is its structure); Plato fears this fatal entrainment, though it’s linked to eidos as possibility of repetition of same

PP.content: absolute invisibility of origin of visibility, father (good-sun-capital), epekeina tēs ousias, a structure where all presences are supplements substituted for absolute origin
PP.linkedContent: absolute invisibility of origin of visibility, father (good-sun-capital), epekeina tēs ousias, a structure where all presences are supplements substituted for absolute origin

PP.content: no repetition possible w/out graphics of supplementarity, supplies for lack of full unity, being enough the same and enough the other to replace by addition (en ajoutant)
PP.linkedContent: no repetition possible w/out graphics of supplementarity, supplies for lack of full unity, being enough the same and enough the other to replace by addition (en ajoutant)

VP.content: originary supplement of the lack, an originary non-self-presence, supplementarity is differance
VP.linkedContent: originary supplement of the lack, an originary non-self-presence, supplementarity is differance

VP.content: w/ supplement the for-itself of presence becomes “in the place of (für etwas)” itself; structure of supplement: “a possibility produces by delay that to which it is said to be added”
VP.linkedContent: w/ supplement the for-itself of presence becomes “in the place of (für etwas)” itself; structure of supplement: “a possibility produces by delay that to which it is said to be added”

FSW.content: Freud’s supplementarity: unconscious not a code book, nachträglich
FSW.linkedContent: Freud’s supplementarity: unconscious not a code book, nachträglich

FSW.content: supplement [from Littré]: add what is missing, supply necessary surplus [add plentitude to plenitude]
FSW.linkedContent: supplement [from Littré]: add what is missing, supply necessary surplus [add plentitude to plenitude]

DS.content: internal division w/in mimēsis, double of itself, destined to mime or mask itself, everything played in paradox of supplementary double
DS.linkedContent: internal division w/in mimēsis, double of itself, destined to mime or mask itself, everything played in paradox of supplementary double

DS.content: surprise in writing, supplement, baffling economy of seduction: entre… un silence
DS.linkedContent: surprise in writing, supplement, baffling economy of seduction: entre… un silence

DS.content: to write that such a movement [practice of spacing, antre ouvert, insertion] plays along a structure of supplementarity, surplus, vicariousness, is, literally, to quote
DS.linkedContent: to write that such a movement [practice of spacing, antre ouvert, insertion] plays along a structure of supplementarity, surplus, vicariousness, is, literally, to quote

DS.content: supplement in Mallarmé (not unilateral movement, like in Rousseau, which loses warmth of spoken word): c’est l’excès d’un signifiant qui, en son dedans, supplée l’espace et répète l’ouverture
DS.linkedContent: supplement in Mallarmé (not unilateral movement, like in Rousseau, which loses warmth of spoken word): c’est l’excès d’un signifiant qui, en son dedans, supplée l’espace et répète l’ouverture

DS.content: supplementary double will always defy & baffle criticism, always one extra rejoinder, one recess or representation too many, and thus too few
DS.linkedContent: supplementary double will always defy & baffle criticism, always one extra rejoinder, one recess or representation too many, and thus too few

DS.content: replication of tissue and a re-folding
DS.linkedContent: replication of tissue and a re-folding

DS.content: Aufhebung—most “relevant” way of (re)covering (up) graphics of supplementarity or hymen, le recouvrement le plus séduisant, because most similar > thus, must critique Aufhebung as decisive target, that which obfuscates specificity of “writing operation”
DS.linkedContent: Aufhebung—most “relevant” way of (re)covering (up) graphics of supplementarity or hymen, le recouvrement le plus séduisant, because most similar > thus, must critique Aufhebung as decisive target, that which obfuscates specificity of “writing operation”

DS.content: in all rigor, supplementary mark is neither metaphor nor metonymy
DS.linkedContent: in all rigor, supplementary mark is neither metaphor nor metonymy

DS.content: supplementary addition [addiction] enriches itself w/ zeros > racing toward infinity: “more” and “less” are separated/united by next-to-nothing of the hymen
DS.linkedContent: supplementary addition [addiction] enriches itself w/ zeros > racing toward infinity: “more” and “less” are separated/united by next-to-nothing of the hymen

O.content: dissemination also explains itself, “the apparatus explains itself,” constitutes itself into a program (heterogeneity, absolute exteriority of seed), but one that is not formalizable, infinity of its code, sa rupture, not saturated w/ self-presence: “it is attached (tient), so to speak, to the incessant falling of a supplement to the code”
O.linkedContent: dissemination also explains itself, “the apparatus explains itself,” constitutes itself into a program (heterogeneity, absolute exteriority of seed), but one that is not formalizable, infinity of its code, sa rupture, not saturated w/ self-presence: “it is attached (tient), so to speak, to the incessant falling of a supplement to the code”

O.content: sense of fulfillment by way of copula (is) means nature is incomplete, needs a book to complete itself: closure of library articulates itself and turns on this hinge (gond): logic, rather graphics, of supplement
O.linkedContent: sense of fulfillment by way of copula (is) means nature is incomplete, needs a book to complete itself: closure of library articulates itself and turns on this hinge (gond): logic, rather graphics, of supplement

REST.content: temptation to stand shoes upright again, to return them to authentic subject: la structure de la chose et du procès oblige, alors, toujours, à en rajouter (to keep adding to it) > to put back becomes a supplementary retortion, delirious dramaturgy > these shoes are hallucinogenic
REST.linkedContent: temptation to stand shoes upright again, to return them to authentic subject: la structure de la chose et du procès oblige, alors, toujours, à en rajouter (to keep adding to it) > to put back becomes a supplementary retortion, delirious dramaturgy > these shoes are hallucinogenic

REST.content: if clothing for Kant is parergonal what do we make of these unlaced shoes? a “pure” supplement?
REST.linkedContent: if clothing for Kant is parergonal what do we make of these unlaced shoes? a “pure” supplement?

REST.content: identification, like attribution, has supplementary/parergonal structure > because demand for reattachment is insatiable, unsatisfied, always making a higher bid, always starts out again
REST.linkedContent: identification, like attribution, has supplementary/parergonal structure > because demand for reattachment is insatiable, unsatisfied, always making a higher bid, always starts out again

PIO.content: supplementarity introduces (into structure of psyche) the fabulous repetition, a crossing of chance & necessity, bending performative rules while respecting them: allows other to come, or announce’s its coming, in dehiscence’s opening > deconstruction
PIO.linkedContent: supplementarity introduces (into structure of psyche) the fabulous repetition, a crossing of chance & necessity, bending performative rules while respecting them: allows other to come, or announce’s its coming, in dehiscence’s opening > deconstruction

AFR.content: after Condillac admits he had to take great detours, Derrida explains that the sign is the name of this detour, experience itself as detour, generation of suppléance to be retraced
AFR.linkedContent: after Condillac admits he had to take great detours, Derrida explains that the sign is the name of this detour, experience itself as detour, generation of suppléance to be retraced

AFR.content: acc. Condillac, theoretical is only a supplying remark (remarque suppléante) of the practical
AFR.linkedContent: acc. Condillac, theoretical is only a supplying remark (remarque suppléante) of the practical

AFR.content: operation of suppléance (supplementation or supplying) produces overabundance & frivolous futility
AFR.linkedContent: operation of suppléance (supplementation or supplying) produces overabundance & frivolous futility

AFR.content: for Condillac, repetition and absence of perceptual present to itself: gap or deviation of time > opens representative vection [desire] w/in sign & idea: suppléance as representation
AFR.linkedContent: for Condillac, repetition and absence of perceptual present to itself: gap or deviation of time > opens representative vection [desire] w/in sign & idea: suppléance as representation

HST.content: at heart of logic of substitution/supplement there’s apparently a crossing of natural reproduction & technological reproducibility, natural series & institutional deviation, natural filiation & adoption as legal fiction > unless this logic threatens/ruins opposition nature/institution
HST.linkedContent: at heart of logic of substitution/supplement there’s apparently a crossing of natural reproduction & technological reproducibility, natural series & institutional deviation, natural filiation & adoption as legal fiction > unless this logic threatens/ruins opposition nature/institution

C.content: supplement of consequence contains everything, including abyss

LI.content: another parasitic/fictional structure can always be added, “supplément de code” > everything becomes possible against the language-police
LI.linkedContent: another parasitic/fictional structure can always be added, “supplément de code” > everything becomes possible against the language-police

LI.content: never be able to de-limit object-fiction/object-parasite except by another counter-fiction
LI.linkedContent: never be able to de-limit object-fiction/object-parasite except by another counter-fiction

LI.content: or, or rather, even parentheses, i.e. “citation (iterability)” > not genus/species, not identity, classical logic fractured in its code, parasitic contamination entame all these relations, which is why words have to be qualified, supplemented by others
LI.linkedContent: or, or rather, even parentheses, i.e. “citation (iterability)” > not genus/species, not identity, classical logic fractured in its code, parasitic contamination entame all these relations, which is why words have to be qualified, supplemented by others

LI.content: inner purity & exterior supplement—this is myth itself (mythology of a logos)
LI.linkedContent: inner purity & exterior supplement—this is myth itself (mythology of a logos)

TN.content: one should take the technical supplement into account
TN.linkedContent: one should take the technical supplement into account

TN.content: leibhaftig as incarnate? does Leib have flesh? > what about machine-bodies, technical supplements, which are both Körper and Leib [p. 361n Derrida points to his early work on Husserl]
TN.linkedContent: leibhaftig as incarnate? does Leib have flesh? > what about machine-bodies, technical supplements, which are both Körper and Leib [p. 361n Derrida points to his early work on Husserl]

BSi.content: truth of bêtise: upping ante, denying it (hyperbolically), always adds a supplement of bêtise
BSi.linkedContent: truth of bêtise: upping ante, denying it (hyperbolically), always adds a supplement of bêtise

OG.content: impossibility of designating supplement escapes metaphysics by a hairsbreadth (par une pointe), “elle doit pour le reste puiser ses ressources dans la logique qu’elle déconstruit”
OG.linkedContent: impossibility of designating supplement escapes metaphysics by a hairsbreadth (par une pointe), “elle doit pour le reste puiser ses ressources dans la logique qu’elle déconstruit”

EU.content: for Schelling, man is tasked w/ supplementing, complementing, the world’s manifestation (eine Ergänzung der Welterscheinung) > develop God’s revelation, which is lacking: this is called translation, it is the destination of the university
EU.linkedContent: for Schelling, man is tasked w/ supplementing, complementing, the world’s manifestation (eine Ergänzung der Welterscheinung) > develop God’s revelation, which is lacking: this is called translation, it is the destination of the university

SPEC.content: inscription of a subject in his [Freud’s] text is also condition of the performance/pertinence of a text, beyond empirical subjectivity, supposing that could exist as soon as one writes, substitutes, supplements: notion of truth incapable of accounting for this performance
SPEC.linkedContent: inscription of a subject in his [Freud’s] text is also condition of the performance/pertinence of a text, beyond empirical subjectivity, supposing that could exist as soon as one writes, substitutes, supplements: notion of truth incapable of accounting for this performance

FV.content: [re: narrator identifying w/ Dupin in Purloined…] if dual relation btwn 2 doubles overflows & simulates symbolic: opposition imaginary/symbolic has little pertinence
FV.linkedContent: [re: narrator identifying w/ Dupin in Purloined…] if dual relation btwn 2 doubles overflows & simulates symbolic: opposition imaginary/symbolic has little pertinence

FV.content: position of each character identifies itself w/ the other & divides itself: even the position du mort (dummy) and of a supplementary 4th [beyond triangle] [all characters occupy all positions]
FV.linkedContent: position of each character identifies itself w/ the other & divides itself: even the position du mort (dummy) and of a supplementary 4th [beyond triangle] [all characters occupy all positions]
